choice: Choose How You Want to Select the Image
choice1: Type the Name of the Image (Should be in the Directory: './imagens/')
choice2: Select the Image via File Explorer
input_image: Name of the Image (Without the Extension Name)
scale: Scale (ex: 0.5 to shrink or 2 to size up)
print_speed:
Drawing Options 
 r - Fast Print 
 n - Normal Print
finish: You Wonderfull Work of Art is Done!
